title: Guest Check-in
description: A guest with an existing reservation arrives to check in.

tasks.description: Retrieve the guest's reservation using their name.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly locates the reservation in the Property Management System (PMS).

tasks.description: Verify the guest's identity with a photo ID and confirm the booking details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the identity and reservation details with the guest.

tasks.description: Process a credit card pre-authorization for the room charges and incidentals, and issue room keys.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully processes the pre-auth and encodes key cards for the correct room and dates.
